project.title: Rio Sagrado AI Avatar
project.description:
# üåç The Challenge We‚Äôre Tackling

The Rio Sagrado flows through one of the last and richest remnants of the Atlantic Forest in Brazil‚Äîa biome critical to global biodiversity and local Indigenous and traditional communities. But this sacred river and region has been under severe threat from a proposed international railroad project, set to destroy more than 100 water springs and fragment delicate ecosystems. Local communities are at risk of losing not only their water source, but also a cultural and spiritual landmark. If nothing is done, we risk irreversible damage to both nature and heritage.

---

# üìú Our Solution

We created the **Rio Sagrado Avatar**, a digital-physical AI representation of the river, co-designed with the local community. Blending art, science, and activism, the Avatar gives the river a **voice**‚Äîliterally and symbolically‚Äîto speak for itself in political and educational spaces. It features:

- A sculpture crafted by a local artisan,
- An AI language model trained on watershed science and community stories,
- A sensor system for real-time environmental monitoring.

This AI-vatar acts as a guardian and storyteller, helping protect the river and inspiring new legal and cultural frameworks that recognize **nature‚Äôs rights**.

---

# üå± Our Organisation/Community

This project is led by [Sympoiesis](https://sympoiesis.xyz/) in collaboration with:
- grassroots community leaders from the Rio Sagrado Region in Morretes-PR,
- Local and international artists,
- Local and international scientists,
- environmental advocates from Brazil and abroad.

It represents a symbiotic alliance between people, technology, and nature.

---

# üñºÔ∏è See Our Impact  
![Hypercert Image](https://www.ecocertain.xyz/_next/image?url=%2Fapi%2Fhypercert-image%2F42220-0x16bA53B74c234C870c61EFC04cD418B8f2865959-54104896340429215690676562581651145621504&w=384&q=75)


üîó [View Our Hypercert](https://www.ecocertain.xyz/hypercert/42220-0x16bA53B74c234C870c61EFC04cD418B8f2865959-54104896340429215690676562581651145621504)


# üìù What This Hypercert Represents

This Hypercert captures the creation and deployment of the Rio Sagrado Avatar, including the participatory design process, AI development, and installation of environmental sensors. It encompasses community meetings, the local cultural contributions, and the legislative advocacy it has inspired‚Äîincluding the drafting of a bill to recognize the Rio Sagrado as a living entity with legal rights.

You can talk to the Avatar right now via [this web-interface](https://sympoiesis.xyz/rio-sagrado/) or via [WhatsApp](https://wa.me/+554196638496). You can also monitor the live data from the sensors in the Rio Sagrado's waters via [this link](http://sympoiesis.xyz/api/biodata/iot/).

---

# ‚úÖ Proof That It‚Äôs Working

The Avatar has catalyzed powerful change: it‚Äôs revived heritage, inspired local environmental education, mobilized community action, and led to political conversations around legal personhood for the river.

##### Local Artist, Genadir Oliveira contemplating his creation, the Avatar sculpture:
![Genadir+Avatar](https://i.imgur.com/N94gFdS.jpeg)

##### Community meeting with environmental advocate Dr. Maude Nancy, who drafted a bill for the recognition of the Rio Sagrado's rights:
![maudy](https://i.imgur.com/ZWBmfmM.jpeg)

##### Video showcasing the Rio Sagrado Avatar installation (CLICK TO PLAY):
[![Screen Shot 2025-04-04 at 8.52.12 PM](https://i.imgur.com/UJyZnrV.png)](https://youtu.be/TZCNrNeL3t4?si=HyTbKhNr87NYJQKw)

##### Short sci-fi community-led film around the Rio Sagrado (CLICK TO PLAY):
[![Screen Shot 2025-04-04 at 9.08.37 PM](https://i.imgur.com/DjcbgqJ.png)](https://vimeo.com/850179762)


üìÇ [See more Proof of Impact](https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/folders/17p2VsvRPQXguAiq3jHB3TbiFdzNLtGcc)

It is also worth mentioning that the Rio Sagrado Avatar has opened up the doors for a wider collaboration with [MAPAS ‚Äì Methods of Support for Environmental and Social Practices](https://www.garn.org/mapas-outstanding-member-of-the-month/), a Brazilian organization that has spearheaded legal recognition for Nature‚Äôs rights across Brazil. And there is now an [ongoing campaign to finance the development of other "Nature's AI Avatars" for non-human entities granted with legal rights in the country](https://mapas.org.br/ia-vatares/).

---

# üí° Join Us in Making a Difference!

The Rio Sagrado needs guardians‚Äîand your support helps amplify its voice. Your donation sustains ongoing community-led monitoring, legal advocacy, and AI updates. Help us protect this sacred river and pioneer a future where nature can speak for itself.
